Text:
Beware the resolution is very low. 62MB for 28 minutes.
Use the other torrent to at least get the first season at a higher res.

For Higher res, search 
Extras (BBC)

for first season on The pirate bay

and
UK - Extras - Season 2 (BBC2 XVID)
elsewhere
for season 2

Search also
Extras-The Extra Special Series Finale 
on the pirate bay

(I kept getting "Data errors" when I wrote down a URL above.)
By elsewhere I mean
torrent z dot comm
